item.title: Descartes and Necessity of Spread Operator
item.description: Descartes and Necessity of Spread Operator Descartes believed dualism of mind and body,he thought they couldn’t have the same origin since body is divisible,while mind is not; only one difference was enough to make two different objects. Let’s think the two same pencils are produced in the factory, everything are the same but their positions in the world so they are not exactly same. if everything would be same , they would come together and become one single object.
